EmailTemplate.name: Complaints Case Feedback
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Case.Thread_Id}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Case.Email_Sender_Name__c}
Regarding your complaint : #{!Case.CaseNumber}
We would like to advise that we are still investigating this matter and are ensuring it receives the priority it deserves.
We will correspond with you again in due course to confirm the resolution or further progress on the matter.
Please feel free to give us a call on 086 022 7232 or send us an email on absaeb@absa.co.za.
Yours sincerely
EBS Helpdesk
